name: The Maloney No. 2
description: This bourbon and Cynar cocktail is rich and strong, with a touch of citrusy sweetness balanced by a nice bitter finish.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice and add bourbon, sweet vermouth, Cynar, and maraschino liqueur. Stir until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled rocks glass and garnish with an orange twist.
